1: -module(sm_SUITE).
    2: -compile(export_all).
    3: 
    4: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    7: 
    8: -define(MOD_SM, mod_stream_management).
    9: -define(CONSTRAINT_CHECK_TIMEOUT, 5000).
   10: 
   11: -import(vcard_update, [discard_vcard_update/1,
   12:                        has_mod_vcard_xupdate/0,
   13:                        server_string/1]).
   14: -import(escalus_stanza, [setattr/3]).
   15: 
   16: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   17: %% Suite configuration
   18: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   19: 
   20: all() ->
   21:     [server_string_type,
   22:      {group, negotiation},
   23:      {group, server_acking},
   24:      {group, client_acking},
   25:      {group, reconnection},
   26:      {group, resumption}
   27:      ].
   28: 
   29: groups() ->
   30:     [{negotiation, [shuffle, {repeat, 5}], [server_announces_sm,
   31:                                             server_enables_sm_before_session,
   32:                                             server_enables_sm_after_session,
   33:                                             server_returns_failed_after_start,
   34:                                             server_returns_failed_after_auth,
   35:                                             server_enables_resumption]},
   36:      {server_acking,
   37:       [shuffle, {repeat, 5}], [basic_ack,
   38:                                h_ok_before_session,
   39:                                h_ok_after_session_enabled_before_session,
   40:                                h_ok_after_session_enabled_after_session,
   41:                                h_ok_after_a_chat]},
   42:      {client_acking,
   43:       [shuffle, {repeat, 5}], [client_acks_more_than_sent,
   44:                                too_many_unacked_stanzas,
   45:                                server_requests_ack,
   46:                                server_requests_ack_after_session,
   47:                                resend_more_offline_messages_than_buffer_size
   48:                               ]},
   49:      {reconnection, [shuffle, {repeat, 5}], [
   50:                                     resend_unacked_on_reconnection,
   51:                                     preserve_order,
   52:                                     resend_unacked_after_resume_timeout,
   53:                                     resume_session_state_send_message,
   54:                                     resume_session_state_stop_c2s
   55:                                    ]},
   56:      {resumption, [shuffle, {repeat, 5}], [session_established,
   57:                                            wait_for_resumption,
   58:                                            resume_session]}].
   59: 
   60: suite() ->
   61:     escalus:suite().
   62: 
   63: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: %% Init & teardown
   65: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   66: 
   67: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   68:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:setup_option(ack_freq(never), Config),
   69:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_suite(NewConfig),
   70:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   71: 
   72: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   73:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:reset_option(ack_freq(never), Config),
   74:     NewConfig1 = escalus:delete_users(NewConfig, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])),
   75:     escalus:end_per_suite(NewConfig1).
   76: 
   77: init_per_group(client_acking, Config) ->
   78:     enable_manual_sm_for(Config, alice);
   79: init_per_group(reconnection, Config) ->
   80:     enable_manual_sm_for(Config, alice);
   81: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   82:     Config.
   83: 
   84: enable_manual_sm_for(C0, User) ->
   85:     C1 = escalus_users:update_userspec(C0, alice, stream_management, true),
   86:     escalus_users:update_userspec(C1, alice, manual_ack, true).
   87: 
   88: end_per_group(reconnection, Config)->
   89:     discard_offline_messages(Config, alice),
   90:     clear_session_table(),
   91:     clear_sm_session_table(),
   92:     true = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [never]),
   93:     enable_manual_sm_for(Config, alice);
   94: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   95:     Config.
   96: 
   97: init_per_testcase(h_ok_after_a_chat = CaseName, Config) ->
   98:     NewConfig = escalus_users:update_userspec(Config, alice,
   99:                                               stream_management, true),
  100:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, NewConfig);
  101: init_per_testcase(too_many_unacked_stanzas = CaseName, Config) ->
  102:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:setup_option(buffer_max(2), Config),
  103:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, NewConfig);
  104: init_per_testcase(resend_more_offline_messages_than_buffer_size = CaseName, Config) ->
  105:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:setup_option(buffer_max(2), Config),
  106:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, NewConfig);
  107: init_per_testcase(server_requests_ack = CaseName, Config) ->
  108:     AckFreq = 2 + case has_mod_vcard_xupdate() of
  109:                       true -> 1;
  110:                       _ -> 0
  111:                   end,
  112:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:setup_option(ack_freq(AckFreq), Config),
  113:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, NewConfig);
  114: init_per_testcase(server_requests_ack_after_session = CaseName, Config) ->
  115:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:setup_option(ack_freq(1), Config),
  116:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, NewConfig);
  117: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  118:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  119: 
  120: 
  121: end_per_testcase(too_many_unacked_stanzas = CaseName, Config) ->
  122:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:reset_option(buffer_max(2), Config),
  123:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, NewConfig);
  124: end_per_testcase(resend_more_offline_messages_than_buffer_size = CaseName, Config) ->
  125:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:reset_option(buffer_max(2), Config),
  126:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, NewConfig);
  127: end_per_testcase(server_requests_ack = CaseName, Config) ->
  128:     AckFreq = 2 + case has_mod_vcard_xupdate() of
  129:                       true -> 1;
  130:                       _ -> 0
  131:                   end,
  132:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:reset_option(ack_freq(AckFreq), Config),
  133:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, NewConfig);
  134: end_per_testcase(server_requests_ack_after_session = CaseName, Config) ->
  135:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:reset_option(ack_freq(1), Config),
  136:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, NewConfig);
  137: end_per_testcase(wait_for_resumption = CaseName, Config) ->
  138:     discard_offline_messages(Config, alice),
  139:     clear_session_table(),
  140:     clear_sm_session_table(),
  141:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config);
  142: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  143:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  144: 
  145: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  146: %% Tests
  147: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  148: 
  149: server_string_type(_) ->
  150:     ct:pal("server string type: ~p~n", [vcard_update:server_string_type()]).
  151: 
  152: server_announces_sm(Config) ->
  153:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true}
  154:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  155:     {ok, _, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  156:                                                         [start_stream]),
  157:     true = escalus_session:can_use_stream_management(Props, Features).
  158: 
  159: server_enables_sm_before_session(Config) ->
  160:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true}
  161:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  162:     {ok, _, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, [start_stream,
  163:                                                          stream_features,
  164:                                                          maybe_use_ssl,
  165:                                                          authenticate,
  166:                                                          bind,
  167:                                                          stream_management]).
  168: 
  169: server_enables_sm_after_session(Config) ->
  170:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true}
  171:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  172:     {ok, _, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, [start_stream,
  173:                                                          stream_features,
  174:                                                          maybe_use_ssl,
  175:                                                          authenticate,
  176:                                                          bind,
  177:                                                          session,
  178:                                                          stream_management]).
  179: 
  180: server_returns_failed_after_start(Config) ->
  181:     server_returns_failed(Config, []).
  182: 
  183: server_returns_failed_after_auth(Config) ->
  184:     server_returns_failed(Config, [authenticate]).
  185: 
  186: server_enables_resumption(Config) ->
  187:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true}
  188:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  189:     %% Assert matches {ok, _, _, _}
  190:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  191:                                                  [start_stream,
  192:                                                   stream_features,
  193:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  194:                                                   authenticate,
  195:                                                   bind,
  196:                                                   session,
  197:                                                   stream_resumption]),
  198:     escalus_connection:stop(Alice).
  199: 
  200: server_returns_failed(Config, ConnActions) ->
  201:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true}
  202:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  203:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  204:                                                  [start_stream,
  205:                                                   stream_features,
  206:                                                   maybe_use_ssl]
  207:                                                  ++ ConnActions),
  208:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:enable_sm()),
  209:     escalus:assert(is_sm_failed, [<<"unexpected-request">>],
  210:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, enable_sm_failed)).
  211: 
  212: basic_ack(Config) ->
  213:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true}
  214:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  215:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  216:                                                  [start_stream,
  217:                                                   stream_features,
  218:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  219:                                                   authenticate,
  220:                                                   bind,
  221:                                                   session,
  222:                                                   stream_management]),
  223:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  224:     escalus:assert(is_roster_result,
  225:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, roster_result)),
  226:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  227:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack,
  228:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, stream_mgmt_ack)).
  229: 
  230: %% Test that "h" value is valid when:
  231: %% - SM is enabled *before* the session is established
  232: %% - <r/> is sent *before* the session is established
  233: h_ok_before_session(Config) ->
  234:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true}
  235:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  236:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  237:                                                  [start_stream,
  238:                                                   stream_features,
  239:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  240:                                                   authenticate,
  241:                                                   bind,
  242:                                                   stream_management]),
  243:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  244:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, [0],
  245:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, stream_mgmt_ack)).
  246: 
  247: %% Test that "h" value is valid when:
  248: %% - SM is enabled *before* the session is established
  249: %% - <r/> is sent *after* the session is established
  250: h_ok_after_session_enabled_before_session(Config) ->
  251:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true}
  252:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  253:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  254:                                                  [start_stream,
  255:                                                   stream_features,
  256:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  257:                                                   authenticate,
  258:                                                   bind,
  259:                                                   stream_management,
  260:                                                   session]),
  261:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  262:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, [1],
  263:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, stream_mgmt_ack)).
  264: 
  265: %% Test that "h" value is valid when:
  266: %% - SM is enabled *after* the session is established
  267: %% - <r/> is sent *after* the session is established
  268: h_ok_after_session_enabled_after_session(Config) ->
  269:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true}
  270:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  271:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  272:                                                  [start_stream,
  273:                                                   stream_features,
  274:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  275:                                                   authenticate,
  276:                                                   bind,
  277:                                                   session,
  278:                                                   stream_management]),
  279:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  280:     escalus:assert(is_roster_result,
  281:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, roster_result)),
  282:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  283:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, [1],
  284:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, stream_mgmt_ack)).
  285: 
  286: %% Test that "h" value is valid after exchanging a few messages.
  287: h_ok_after_a_chat(Config) ->
  288:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice,1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  289:         NDiscarded = discard_vcard_update(Alice),
  290:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi, Bob!">>)),
  291:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi, Bob!">>],
  292:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  293:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice!">>)),
  294:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi, Alice!">>],
  295:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  296:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"How's life?">>)),
  297:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"How's life?">>],
  298:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  299:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Pretty !@#$%^$">>)),
  300:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Pretty !@#$%^$">>],
  301:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  302:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  303:         escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, [3], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  304:         %% Ack, so that unacked messages don't go into offline store.
  305:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(3 + NDiscarded))
  306:     end).
  307: 
  308: client_acks_more_than_sent(Config) ->
  309:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice,1}], fun(Alice) ->
  310:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(5)),
  311:         escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"policy-violation">>,
  312:                                          <<"h attribute too big">>],
  313:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  314:     end).
  315: 
  316: too_many_unacked_stanzas(Config) ->
  317:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice,1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  318:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice!">>),
  319:         [escalus:send(Bob, Msg) || _ <- lists:seq(1,2)],
  320:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  321:         escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"resource-constraint">>,
  322:                                          <<"too many unacked stanzas">>],
  323:                        %% wait for deffered buffer check
  324:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, ?CONSTRAINT_CHECK_TIMEOUT + 1000))
  325:     end),
  326:     discard_offline_messages(Config, alice).
  327: 
  328: server_requests_ack(Config) ->
  329:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice,1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  330:         discard_vcard_update(Alice),
  331:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice!">>)),
  332:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi, Alice!">>],
  333:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  334:         escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  335:     end),
  336:     discard_offline_messages(Config, alice).
  337: 
  338: server_requests_ack_after_session(Config) ->
  339:     AliceSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice),
  340:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  341:                                                  [start_stream,
  342:                                                   stream_features,
  343:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  344:                                                   authenticate,
  345:                                                   bind,
  346:                                                   stream_management,
  347:                                                   session
  348:                                                  ]),
  349:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, stream_mgmt_req)).
  350: 
  351: 
  352: resend_more_offline_messages_than_buffer_size(Config) ->
  353:     ConnSteps =  [start_stream,
  354:                   stream_features,
  355:                   authenticate,
  356:                   bind,
  357:                   session],
  358: 
  359:     %% connect bob and alice
  360:     BobSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, bob),
  361:     {ok, Bob, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec),
  362:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  363:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Bob, presence),
  364:     AliceSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice),
  365: 
  366:     % sent some messages - more than unacked buffer size
  367:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"1">>)),
  368:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"2">>)),
  369:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"3">>)),
  370: 
  371:     % connect alice who wants to receive all messages from offline storage
  372:     {ok, Alice, _Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps++[stream_management]),
  373:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  374: 
  375:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, msg_1),
  376:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, msg_2),
  377:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, msg_3),
  378:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence),
  379: 
  380:     % confirm messages + presence
  381:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(4)),
  382:     % wait for check constraint message on server side
  383:     ct:sleep(?CONSTRAINT_CHECK_TIMEOUT+1000),
  384: 
  385:     % should not receive anything especially any stream errors
  386:     false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(Alice),
  387: 
  388:     escalus_connection:stop(Alice),
  389:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob),
  390:     discard_offline_messages(Config, alice).
  391: 
  392: resend_unacked_on_reconnection(Config) ->
  393:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [never]),
  394:     Messages = [<<"msg-1">>, <<"msg-2">>, <<"msg-3">>],
  395:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  396:         discard_vcard_update(Alice),
  397:         %% Bob sends some messages to Alice.
  398:         [escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, Msg))
  399:          || Msg <- Messages],
  400:         %% Alice receives the messages.
  401:         Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
  402:         [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], Stanza)
  403:          || {Msg, Stanza} <- lists:zip(Messages, Stanzas)]
  404:         %% Alice disconnects without acking the messages.
  405:     end),
  406:     %% Messages go to the offline store.
  407:     %% Alice receives the messages from the offline store.
  408:     %% This is done without escalus:story() as a story() performs
  409:     %% an is_presence assertion on the first stanza after connection
  410:     %% initiation which fails as the message from offline store will come
  411:     %% before that presence.
  412:     AliceSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice),
  413:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec),
  414:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  415:     Stanzas = [escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, {msg, I})
  416:                || I <- lists:seq(1, 3)],
  417:     [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], Stanza)
  418:      || {Msg, Stanza} <- lists:zip(Messages, Stanzas)],
  419:     %% Alice acks the delayed messages so they won't go again
  420:     %% to the offline store.
  421:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(3)).
  422: 
  423: preserve_order(Config) ->
  424:     TIMEOUT = 60,
  425:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_resume_timeout, [TIMEOUT]),
  426:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [1]),
  427:     ConnSteps =  [start_stream,
  428:                   stream_features,
  429:                   authenticate,
  430:                   bind,
  431:                   session],
  432: 
  433:     %% connect bob and alice
  434:     BobSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, bob),
  435:     {ok, Bob, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec),
  436:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  437:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Bob, presence),
  438: 
  439:     AliceSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice),
  440:     {ok, Alice, _Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps++[stream_resumption]),
  441:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  442:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence),
  443: 
  444:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, ack)),
  445:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"1">>)),
  446: 
  447:     %% kill alice connection
  448:     kill_connection(Alice),
  449:     %ct:sleep(300),
  450:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"2">>)),
  451:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"3">>)),
  452: 
  453:     {ok, NewAlice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  454:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:enable_sm([resume])),
  455: 
  456:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"4">>)),
  457:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"5">>)),
  458: 
  459:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  460:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"6">>)),
  461: 
  462:     receive_all_ordered(NewAlice,1),
  463: 
  464:     % replace connection
  465:     {ok, NewAlice2, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  466:     % allow messages to go to the offline storage
  467:     ct:sleep(1000),
  468: 
  469:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice2, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  470: 
  471:     % receves messages in correct order
  472:     receive_all_ordered(NewAlice2, 1),
  473: 
  474:     %revert changes
  475:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_resume_timeout, [600]),
  476:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob),
  477:     escalus_connection:stop(NewAlice2),
  478:     discard_offline_messages(Config, alice).
  479: 
  480: receive_all_ordered(Conn, N) ->
  481:     case catch escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, msg) of
  482:         #xmlel{} = Stanza ->
  483: 	    NN = case Stanza#xmlel.name of
  484:         <<"message">> ->
  485: %% 		    ct:pal("~p~n", [Stanza]),
  486:             escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N))], Stanza),
  487:             N+1;
  488: 		_ ->
  489: 		    N
  490: 	    end,
  491:             receive_all_ordered(Conn, NN);
  492:         _Error ->
  493:             ok
  494:     end.
  495: 
  496: resend_unacked_after_resume_timeout(Config) ->
  497:     TIMEOUT = 5,
  498:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_resume_timeout, [TIMEOUT]),
  499:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [1]),
  500:     ConnSteps =  [start_stream,
  501:                   stream_features,
  502:                   authenticate,
  503:                   bind,
  504:                   session],
  505: 
  506:     %% connect bob and alice
  507:     BobSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, bob),
  508:     {ok, Bob, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec),
  509:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  510:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Bob, presence),
  511: 
  512:     AliceSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice),
  513:     {ok, Alice, _Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps++[stream_resumption]),
  514:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  515:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence),
  516: 
  517:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, ack)),
  518: 
  519:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"msg-1">>)),
  520:     %% kill alice connection
  521:     kill_connection(Alice),
  522:     U = proplists:get_value(username, AliceSpec),
  523:     S = proplists:get_value(server, AliceSpec),
  524:     1 = length(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_user_resources, [U, S])),
  525:     %% wait 2 times longer to be sure that c2s is dead
  526:     ct:sleep({seconds, 2*TIMEOUT}),
  527:     %% ensure there is no session
  528:     0 = length(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_user_resources, [U, S])),
  529: 
  530:     %% alice come back and receives unacked message
  531:     {ok, NewAlice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  532:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  533: 
  534:     Stanzas =[escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, msg),
  535:               escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, msg)],
  536: 
  537:     escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence,
  538:                                   is_chat(<<"msg-1">>)],
  539:                                  Stanzas),
  540:     %% revert timeout change
  541:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_resume_timeout, [600]),
  542: 
  543:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob),
  544:     escalus_connection:stop(Alice),
  545:     discard_offline_messages(Config, alice).
  546: 
  547: resume_session_state_send_message(Config) ->
  548:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [1]),
  549:     ConnSteps =  [
  550:                   start_stream,
  551:                   stream_features,
  552:                   authenticate,
  553:                   bind,
  554:                   session],
  555: 
  556:     %% connect bob and alice
  557:     BobSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, bob),
  558:     {ok, Bob, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec),
  559:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  560:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Bob, presence),
  561: 
  562:     AliceSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice),
  563:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps++[stream_resumption]),
  564:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  565:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence),
  566: 
  567:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, ack)),
  568: 
  569:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"msg-1">>)),
  570:     %% kill alice connection
  571:     kill_connection(Alice),
  572:     ct:sleep(1000), %% alice should be in resume_session_state
  573: 
  574:     U = proplists:get_value(username, AliceSpec),
  575:     S = proplists:get_value(server, AliceSpec),
  576:     1 = length(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_user_resources, [U, S])),
  577: 
  578:     %% send some messages and check if c2s can handle it
  579:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"msg-2">>)),
  580:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"msg-3">>)),
  581: 
  582:     %% alice comes back and receives unacked message
  583:     {ok, NewAlice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  584:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  585: 
  586:     Stanzas = [escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, msg) || _ <- lists:seq(1,4) ],
  587: 
  588:     % what about order ?
  589:     escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence,
  590:                                   is_chat(<<"msg-1">>),
  591:                                   is_chat(<<"msg-2">>),
  592:                                   is_chat(<<"msg-3">>)],
  593:                                  Stanzas),
  594:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob),
  595:     escalus_connection:stop(NewAlice),
  596:     discard_offline_messages(Config, alice).
  597: 
  598: %%for instance it can be done by mod ping
  599: resume_session_state_stop_c2s(Config) ->
  600:     true = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [1]),
  601:     ConnSteps =  [start_stream,
  602:                   stream_features,
  603:                   authenticate,
  604:                   bind,
  605:                   session],
  606: 
  607:     %% connect bob and alice
  608:     BobSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, bob),
  609:     {ok, Bob, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec, ConnSteps),
  610:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  611:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Bob, presence),
  612: 
  613:     AliceSpec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice),
  614:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps++[stream_resumption]),
  615:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  616:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence),
  617: 
  618:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, ack)),
  619:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"msg-1">>)),
  620: 
  621:     % kill alice connection
  622:     kill_connection(Alice),
  623:     ct:sleep(1000), %% alice should be in resume_session_state
  624:     % session should be  alive
  625:     U = proplists:get_value(username, AliceSpec),
  626:     S = proplists:get_value(server, AliceSpec),
  627:     [Res] = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_user_resources, [U, S]),
  628:     %% get pid of c2s and stop him !
  629:     C2SRef = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_session_pid, [U, S, Res]),
  630:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_c2s, stop, [C2SRef] ),
  631:     ct:sleep(1000), %% c2s should be in resume_session_state
  632: 
  633:     %% alice comes back and receives unacked message
  634:     {ok, NewAlice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  635:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  636: 
  637:     Stanzas = [escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, msg),
  638:                escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, msg)],
  639: 
  640:     escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence,
  641:                                   is_chat(<<"msg-1">>)],
  642:                                  Stanzas),
  643: 
  644:     escalus_connection:stop(NewAlice),
  645:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob),
  646:     discard_offline_messages(Config, alice).
  647: 
  648: %% This test only verifies the validity of helpers (get_session_pid,
  649: %% assert_no_offline_msgs, assert_c2s_state) written for wait_for_resumption
  650: %% testcase.
  651: session_established(Config) ->
  652:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true},
  653:                  {manual_ack, true}
  654:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  655:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(_Alice) ->
  656:         {ok, C2SPid} = get_session_pid(AliceSpec, server_string("res1")),
  657:         assert_no_offline_msgs(),
  658:         assert_c2s_state(C2SPid, session_established)
  659:     end).
  660: 
  661: %% Ensure that after a violent disconnection,
  662: %% the c2s waits for resumption (but don't resume yet).
  663: wait_for_resumption(Config) ->
  664:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true},
  665:                  {manual_ack, true}
  666:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  667:     Messages = [<<"msg-1">>, <<"msg-2">>, <<"msg-3">>],
  668:     escalus:story(Config, [{bob, 1}], fun(Bob) ->
  669:         {C2SPid, _} = buffer_unacked_messages_and_die(AliceSpec, Bob, Messages),
  670:         %% Ensure the c2s process is waiting for resumption.
  671:         assert_no_offline_msgs(),
  672:         assert_c2s_state(C2SPid, resume_session)
  673:     end).
  674: 
  675: resume_session(Config) ->
  676:     AliceSpec = [{stream_management, true},
  677:                  {manual_ack, true}
  678:                  | escalus_users:get_options(Config, alice)],
  679:     Messages = [<<"msg-1">>, <<"msg-2">>, <<"msg-3">>],
  680:     escalus:story(Config, [{bob, 1}], fun(Bob) ->
  681:         {_, SMID} = buffer_unacked_messages_and_die(AliceSpec, Bob, Messages),
  682:         %% Resume the session.
  683:         Steps = [start_stream,
  684:                  stream_features,
  685:                  maybe_use_ssl,
  686:                  authenticate,
  687:                  mk_resume_stream(SMID, 2)],
  688:         {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, Steps),
  689:         NDiscarded = discard_vcard_update(Alice),
  690:         %% Alice receives the unacked messages from the previous
  691:         %% interrupted session.
  692:         Stanzas = [escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, {msg, I})
  693:                    || I <- lists:seq(1, 3)],
  694:         [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], Stanza)
  695:          || {Msg, Stanza} <- lists:zip(Messages, Stanzas)],
  696:         %% Alice acks the received messages.
  697:         escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(5 + NDiscarded)),
  698:         escalus_connection:stop(Alice)
  699:     end).
  700: 
  701: mk_resume_stream(SMID, PrevH) ->
  702:     fun (Conn, Props, Features) ->
  703:             escalus_connection:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:resume(SMID, PrevH)),
  704:             Resumed = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, get_resumed),
  705:             true = escalus_pred:is_sm_resumed(SMID, Resumed),
  706:             {Conn, [{smid, SMID} | Props], Features}
  707:     end.
  708: 
  709: buffer_unacked_messages_and_die(AliceSpec, Bob, Messages) ->
  710:     Steps = [start_stream,
  711:              stream_features,
  712:              maybe_use_ssl,
  713:              authenticate,
  714:              bind,
  715:              session,
  716:              stream_resumption],
  717:     {ok, Alice, Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, Steps),
  718:     InitialPresence = setattr(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>),
  719:                               <<"id">>, <<"presence1">>),
  720:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, InitialPresence),
  721:     Presence = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence1),
  722:     escalus:assert(is_presence, Presence),
  723:     Res = server_string("escalus-default-resource"),
  724:     {ok, C2SPid} = get_session_pid(AliceSpec, Res),
  725:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  726:     _Presence = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence2),
  727:     discard_vcard_update(Alice),
  728:     %% Bobs sends some messages to Alice.
  729:     [escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(alice, Msg))
  730:      || Msg <- Messages],
  731:     %% Alice receives them, but doesn't ack.
  732:     Stanzas = [escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, {msg, I})
  733:                || I <- lists:seq(1, 3)],
  734:     [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], Stanza)
  735:      || {Msg, Stanza} <- lists:zip(Messages, Stanzas)],
  736:     %% Alice's connection is violently terminated.
  737:     kill_connection(Alice),
  738:     {C2SPid, proplists:get_value(smid, Props)}.
  739: 
  740: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  741: %% Helpers
  742: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  743: 
  744: discard_offline_messages(Config, UserName) ->
  745:     discard_offline_messages(Config, UserName, 1).
  746: 
  747: discard_offline_messages(Config, UserName, H) when is_atom(UserName) ->
  748:     Spec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, UserName),
  749:     {ok, User, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec),
  750:     escalus_connection:send(User, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  751:     discard_offline_messages(Config, User, H);
  752: discard_offline_messages(Config, User, H) ->
  753:     Stanza = escalus_connection:get_stanza(User, maybe_offline_msg),
  754:     escalus_connection:send(User, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(H)),
  755:     case escalus_pred:is_presence(Stanza) of
  756:         true ->
  757:             ok;
  758:         false ->
  759:             discard_offline_messages(Config, User, H+1)
  760:     end.
  761: 
  762: buffer_max(BufferMax) ->
  763:     {buffer_max,
  764:      fun () ->
  765:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, get_buffer_max, [unset])
  766:      end,
  767:      fun (unset) ->
  768:              ct:pal("buffer_max was not set - setting to 'undefined'"),
  769:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_buffer_max, [undefined]);
  770:          (V) ->
  771:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_buffer_max, [V])
  772:      end,
  773:      BufferMax}.
  774: 
  775: ack_freq(AckFreq) ->
  776:     {ack_freq,
  777:      fun () ->
  778:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, get_ack_freq, [unset])
  779:      end,
  780:      fun (unset) ->
  781:              ct:pal("ack_freq was not set - setting to 'undefined'"),
  782:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [undefined]);
  783:          (V) ->
  784:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [V])
  785:      end,
  786:      AckFreq}.
  787: 
  788: assert_no_offline_msgs() ->
  789:     0 = mongoose_helper:total_offline_messages().
  790: 
  791: 
  792: 
  793: assert_c2s_state(C2SPid, StateName) when is_pid(C2SPid) ->
  794:     SysStatus = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, get_status, [C2SPid]),
  795:     StateName = extract_state_name(SysStatus).
  796: 
  797: extract_state_name(SysStatus) ->
  798:     {status, _Pid, {module, _},
  799:      [_, _, _, _, [_, {data, FSMData} | _]]} = SysStatus,
  800:     proplists:get_value("StateName", FSMData).
  801: 
  802: get_session_pid(UserSpec, Resource) ->
  803:     ConfigUS = [proplists:get_value(username, UserSpec),
  804:                 proplists:get_value(server, UserSpec)],
  805:     [U, S] = [server_string(V) || V <- ConfigUS],
  806:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_session_pid, [U, S, server_string(Resource)]) of
  807:         none ->
  808:             {error, no_found};
  809:         C2SPid ->
  810:             {ok, C2SPid}
  811:     end.
  812: 
  813: clear_session_table() ->
  814:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  815:     SessionBackend  = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm_backend, backend, []),
  816:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(SessionBackend, cleanup, [Node]).
  817: 
  818: clear_sm_session_table() ->
  819:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mnesia, clear_table, [sm_session]).
  820: 
  821: kill_connection(#client{module = escalus_tcp, ssl = SSL,
  822:                            socket = Socket} = Conn) ->
  823:     %% Ugly, but there's no API for killing the connection
  824:     %% without sending </stream:stream>.
  825:     case SSL of
  826:         true ->
  827:             ssl:close(Socket);
  828:         false ->
  829:             gen_tcp:close(Socket)
  830:     end,
  831:     %% There might be open zlib streams left...
  832:     catch escalus_connection:stop(Conn).
  833: 
  834: is_chat(Content) ->
  835:     fun(Stanza) -> escalus_pred:is_chat_message(Content, Stanza) end.
  836: 
  837: get_bjid(UserSpec) ->
  838:     User = proplists:get_value(username, UserSpec),
  839:     Server = proplists:get_value(server, UserSpec),
  840:     <<User/binary,"@",Server/binary>>.
